Posts.Title: Double Masectomy for Breast cancer prevention Molasses Molasses

Posts.Content: Molasses wrote: I am in the 90% risk category with BC and ovarian cancer in the maternal side of my family. Years of ultrasounds, MRIs, biopsies, and mammograms for suspicious lumps and calcifications from cystic breast disease I'm talked to my breast surgeon and he agreed I am a good candidate. Has anyone on this site had this surgery? I would like to connect with a patient or expert about this. Please reply. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Double Masectomy for Breast cancer prevention Molasses Molasses

Posts.Content: Molasses wrote: Hello Everyone, This website encourages this testing method as a benchmark for this disease. I tested negative. Still, I worry. There are false negatives as well as false positives. Testing is not a replacement for mammograms, MRIs, and ultrasounds. Please comment. Log in to post a reply
